# delta

**Instance Property**

The “delta” variable of the kernel function.

## Declaration

```swift
var delta: Float { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is `1/1024`.

## Instance Properties

- **alpha**: The “alpha” variable of the kernel function.
- **beta**: The “beta” variable of the kernel function.
- **p0**: The “p0” variable of the kernel function.
- **pm**: The “pm” variable of the kernel function.
- **ps**: The “ps” variable of the kernel function.
